name: Guns&Physics
description:
This is a game was made in 72 hours and this is like my 3rd ever game so yeah im pretty much a beginner so if you find any bugs comment it and i will try to fix it.Also its has funny texts when you die and some physics and guns.I will probably update and add some stuff.

Controls:WASD or the arrow keys to move,spacebar to jump,left click to shoot.

Source code:(not available yet)

Music by evan king(go sub to him or u ded):

an explosion asset i used:https://kvsr.itch.io/explosion
